title: Youth Sunday School Program Launch
subtitle: Expanding Our Educational Ministry
author: Youth Ministry Team
excerpt: Exciting news about our expanded youth programs, including new classes for teenagers and young adults in our community.

sections.title: Program Overview
content: We are excited to announce the launch of our expanded **Youth Sunday School Program**, designed to serve children and young adults from ages 5 to 25. This comprehensive program aims to strengthen our young people's understanding of Orthodox Tewahdo faith and traditions.
The program includes age-appropriate classes, interactive learning activities, and opportunities for spiritual growth within our church community.

sections.title: Class Structure
content: **Children's Classes (Ages 5-12):** Basic Bible stories, Orthodox traditions, and Ge'ez alphabet introduction.
**Youth Classes (Ages 13-18):** Church history, theological foundations, and preparation for adult participation in church life.
**Young Adults (Ages 19-25):** Advanced theological discussions, leadership development, and community service opportunities.

sections.title: Schedule and Registration
content: Classes are held every Sunday after the Divine Liturgy, from 1:00 PM to 2:30 PM. The program runs throughout the school year with breaks during major fasting periods.
Registration is open to all families in our community. Please contact the church office or speak with any member of the Youth Ministry Team to enroll your children.

sections.title: Volunteer Opportunities
content: We are always looking for dedicated volunteers to help with our youth programs. Whether you have teaching experience or simply a heart for working with young people, there are many ways to contribute.
Volunteer roles include teaching assistants, activity coordinators, and special event organizers. Training and support are provided for all volunteers.
